alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Northwestern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:32AM EST until January 03 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Delaware and Philadelphia. In New Jersey, Eastern Monmouth, Western Monmouth and Northwestern Burlington. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Monmouth; Northwestern Burlington; Western Monmouth
